{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Blue key gizmo | class = KeyGizmoBlue | game = Heretic | doomednum = 94 }}[[Classes]]: KeyGizmoBlue
A stone sculpture of a winged, serpent-tailed demon holding a blue orb, typically used to mark a door needing a [[Classes:KeyBlue|blue key]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR KeyGizmoBlue { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 50 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: KGZ1 A 1 KGZ1 A 1 [[A_SpawnItemEx]]("{{Class|KeyGizmoFloatBlue}}", 0, 0, 60) KGZ1 A -1 Stop } }
